Blog.post: he saif we're reali over... forever not possible le... sad sia... reali wan to touch gum again... but after tat, i tell him... i will change for him to see... definitely... but i oso tink he will not accept me for wad i am now... so wun patch wif me de... all he says is to ask me find a better guy... but does he noe, no one can ever replace him... in my heart, only him... jamus ji, forever... the one i luv deeply... hais

so happy sia... saw him at bedok... when i'm wif my sisters they all... haha... actually sad sad de... but see until him... i'm crazy lye siao... haha.... cos i'm still waitin for him ma.. heh... tried to behave in front of him... reali tryin to win him back lorz... hehe... he's forever the one who can win the whole of my heart...

[* hais... now hearin songs and chattin wif wen... hmmm, den bery sad... cos songs remind me of him... reali hope all could turn back... and i wun be tat sad now... tgough i may seems happy right now... all are masks tat i put on.. to show a braver look.. but deep down, i'm still cryin... lovin him... nth will ever change my luv for him.. but the reason we break is reali unfair... to me lorz... hais, over le... heart shattered... *]

hmmm. i'm back at hm after days of running... so shiok ar... my frenz oso back from boy's hm... bery happy... he's back... and i can have a lending shoulders when i'm down le... he's a great guy lorz... if gals got him as stead, sure bery gud de... haiz... me oso thinking abt the past... but wat to do... a r/s is not tat easy to put down... especially so serious de... but reali has to get over wif it soon... and move on... oso muz go find for a new sch sia... sianz...

[* haiz, me kena expelled liao... feel lye running away from hm... haiz... lost him le, no point carrying my life... feel lye ending it... parents ground me at hm... can't use the phone... can't do anything... haiz... hate them... should i run??? i reali dunno... they do tis to me, reali bery harsh lorz... lost the one i love... n my freedom... haiz... i can't step out of the house at all... hate it... no freedom!!! oso cannot use house phone... nbcb, i'm damn dulan... wtf, they die early better lah... *]

[* haiz... todae is the end of my love wif him... damn sad sia... kneel down n disgrace myself alot for him le lorz... beg him to gif me one last chance but haiz... love him too much tat he had take me for granted... nbcb... tat bitch... i should wun let her off... mayb now will... but in future, i not sure... he can make the tears of my heart rains.. but neva noe when to stop it... dunno why... he broke my heart again and again... but i still gif him a chance and keep on forgivin him... and he lye take me for granted... end le... mayb gud but tym will be taken to heal all my pain in my heart... and i jus hope he wun make me regret loving him wif all my heart... but i promise to wait for him till he reali breaks my heart... jamus ji, you wun see me in sch anymore le... and you will see a new change in me... even if i ah lian or wat... is out of your care le... gave you all my heart, but tis is wat i get in the end... forget it le... take tat tis whole year, i had loved the wrong person le... but i will still love you... *]

haiz... todae damn angry lorz... jus riched hm... parents there kpkb... make me fed up sia... me damn sad lorz... how i how he was here for me... but he's out there playing... cannot pei me... but i reali hope he can pei me... gif me advice... an wei me... but haiz... he dun care abt me lye tat sia... saddening... hp oso kena confiscated... dulan arh...

hais, will be seeing him later on.. will i cry? i'm not sure lea... i only noe flshes of him stil turn to me... no matter how hard i try to forget you... you still have memories... marks are left behind, for me to stand up again... to be braver each tym, i'm hurt in luv...

eugene pang, you reali make me regret loving you oncel... though i said tat i wun regret going stead wif you... but now, you reali makes my heart filled wif regretions! though is i break wif you, but who wanted it de... i break wif you, so tat i can be the bad and you the good... let ppl say i break unreasonably... cos you dun have a reason to break wif me... if you anyhow break, mummy will scold de lorz... but after i cried jus now, you makes me feel hurt... tat i had once gone stead wif you! so regret sia... forget it le, past is past... jus hope you will go well in a r/s... and not hurt others le...

hmmm, todae break wif eugene le... though is i say de... but still sad sad sia... wad to say, me oso she bu de... but i noe he wan break wif me le... wad fer i wait him break, might as well ibreak wif him... rite? sad sia... but after a gud cry, i'm okie le... ai zai, siao a ginna ai zai de...

hmmm, at first sad sad de... cos he go put ang kong den bled... den he neber pei me... lye trit me cold cold de... but at nte, he called me chat for awhile... first tym sia, den he tot i cry sia... cos i having flu now ma... he dun belief... jus now oso write himn letter, tell him abt my feeling these days de
hais, todae so sad sia... hurt by his words... cried these few days... cos of him... his words and actions reali mean alot to me lorz... wad to do, fell in luv wif him...

hmmm, finally... my birthday le lorz... hais, but how i wish... he will paych wif me... but he wun de... he ard lost feelings for me liao lorz... patch le, oso no use... hais, my birthday wish.... the only thing tat i'll be happier, in life... hais... though my frenz all celebrate for me... i'm still sad... feel lye crying when he told me we no chance... but no matter wad, i muz not cry on my birthday... i can't cry... jus now melvin oso cum pei me... cos i very sad... tmr gg out wif my didi all... den go ps, mit yawen all... celebrate birthday... tmr will be a better day de... for sure, mayb it's reali tym for me... to put down tis r/s... and go for another guy ba... but i noe... it'll be hard... but i muz... even if i cannot, i oso muz try... tym may heals, luv may fades... but memories will always stay behind de lorz...

[X//. hais, tink back of him again... why i jus can't forget abt him? don jio me oso... huan hao, ah leong, leonard, don and jamus... hais, if jamus jio me patch... i sure will de lorz... hmmm, should i accept don? reali bery confusing sia... hais, sad sia .//X]
so happy, se jamus todae.... den we chat on fone... but i noe he no longer mine le...sad sia... hais... when will he be mine, when will he be back... i reali reali luv him still lorz... lots lorz...

hmmm, todae jus stead wif min lun... tink oso wun lasts de ba, logest one week ba?! hmmm, dunno if he still the same old flirt anot lea.. but nvm, i wun put too much heart into it de... cos i heard alot of his ting before stead le.. so aizai, i wun get myself too deep hurt in tis r/s de... keke, gtg le...
